Data.event_text: Sixty tourists and crew are rescued when the Canuwa sinks 400 metres (1,300 ft) from Quimixto beach in Puerto Vallarta. No one was injured.

links.text: -"El impactante momento en que una embarcación se hundió con 60 turistas en Puerto Vallarta". infobae (in European Spanish). January 2, 2021. Retrieved January 2, 2021.-

Data.event_text: Fireworks and bonfires cause the deaths of two adult women and a preteen girl in Topolobampo, Sinaloa.

links.text: -"La Jornada - Incendios en Topolobampo por fogatas y quema de piroctecnia". jornada.com.mx (in Spanish). La Jornada. January 2, 2021. Retrieved January 2, 2021.-

Data.event_text: COVID-19 pandemic in Mexico Dr. Hugo López-Gatell announces that the government has authorized use of the AstraZeneca vaccine.

links.text: -"México autoriza la vacuna de AstraZeneca contra Covid: López-Gatell". El Universal (in Spanish). January 4, 2021. Retrieved January 4, 2021.-

Data.event_text: A fisherman dies after his boat collided on December 31, 2020, with the Farley Mowat operated by U.S.-based Sea Shepherd Conservation Society in the Gulf of California. The family says the man's boat was rammed by the Farley Mowat, and the conservationists claim their boat was attacked while removing illegal fishing nets.

links.text: -"Mexican fisherman 'dies after attack on Sea Shepherd conservationists'". news.yahoo.com. BBC World News. January 4, 2021. Retrieved January 5, 2021.-

Data.event_text: Epiphany Armed members of the Gulf Cartel are photographed delivering toys to children in Villa Progreso, Río Bravo, Tamaulipas. Members of the Jalisco New Generation Cartel (CJNG) distributes toys in Bonifacio Moreno "El Aguaje", Aguililla, Michoacán.

links.text: -"La Jornada - Hombres armados regalaron juguetes a menores en zonas de Tamaulipas". .jornada.com.mx (in Spanish). La Jornada. January 7, 2021. Retrieved January 7, 2021.-
-"El CJNG entregó juguetes de Día de Reyes en el Aguaje, zona donde ha sembrado el terror por años". infobae (in European Spanish). January 7, 2021. Retrieved January 7, 2021.-

Data.event_text: Mexican drug war Nine killed at a funeral in Celaya, five others killed in other parts of the city.

links.text: -"Sicarios abren fuego en un velorio en Celaya y matan a 9 personas". proceso.com.mx (in Spanish). Proceso. January 8, 2021. Retrieved January 8, 2021.-

Data.event_text: Carlos Slim, with a fortune of US$62.1 billion, is the wealthiest person in Mexico, and María Asunción Aramburuzabala (US$5.8 billion), is the wealthiest woman, according to Forbes.

COVID-19 pandemic in Mexico Thirty-five medical students working in a hospital in Ecatepec, State of Mexico, have tested positive; one died on . Students have complained of low salaries, lack of personal protective equipment (PPE), and the fact that they have not been vaccinated but bureaucrats have.

links.text: -"Suman 35 estudiantes de medicina con Covid-19 en hospital donde murió alumno de la UNAM, denuncian". El Universal (in Spanish). January 8, 2021. Retrieved January 9, 2021.-

Data.event_text: A fire in the hotel zone of Tulum, Quintana Roo, burns 36 businesses; 1,000 evacuated.

links.text: -"Fire consumes 36 businesses in Tulum, 1,000 people evacuated". Mexico News Daily. January 8, 2021. Retrieved January 11, 2021.-

Data.event_text: A fire in the Mexico City Metro Offices kills one, injures 32, and shuts down half the rapid transit lines in the city.

links.text: -"Control center fire shuts down half Mexico City subway lines". ABC News. AP. Retrieved January 10, 2021.-

Data.event_text: Speaking from Manzanillo, Colima, AMLO says that control of the ports by the Mexican Navy does not mean "militarization" of the ports.

links.text: -"Que la Marina se haga cargo de puertos no es militarizar, considera AMLO". proceso.com.mx (in Spanish). Proceso. January 10, 2021. Retrieved January 10, 2021.-

Data.event_text: A running gun battle leaves a police officer and nine gunmen dead in Santa Rosa de Lima (Villagrán), Guanajuato.

links.text: -"Running gun battle in Mexico leaves 9 gunmen, 1 police dead". news.yahoo.com. Yahoo News. AP. January 11, 2021. Retrieved January 11, 2021.-

Data.event_text: Mexico and the United States agree to continue border restrictions until .

links.text: -"La Jornada - Extienden México y EU restricciones al tránsito fronterizo". jornada.com.mx (in Spanish). La Jornada. Retrieved January 12, 2021.-

Data.event_text: A law prohibiting corporal punishment or humiliating treatment of children or teenagers goes into effect.

links.text: -Becerril, Andrea; Ballinas, Víctor (January 12, 2021). "La Jornada - Vigente desde hoy la reforma que prohíbe castigos físicos a niñas y niños". jornada.com.mx (in Spanish). La Jornada. Retrieved January 14, 2021.-

Data.event_text: The Army and Navy begin distribution of 439,725 doses of vaccine for health workers at 879 hospitals across the country.

links.text: -Urrutia, Alonso; Martínez, Fabiola (January 13, 2021). "La Jornada - Llegan 439,725 dosis; aplicación masiva desde hoy en 879 hospitales". jornada.com.mx (in Spanish). La Jornada. Retrieved January 13, 2021.-

Data.event_text: Ciudad Nezahualcóyotl reports 100% occupation in its hospitals, and four patients with serious symptoms of COVID-19 are turned away.

links.text: -Ramón, René (January 13, 2021). "La Jornada - Registra Nezahualcóyotl 100% de ocupación hospitalaria por Covid-19". jornada.com.mx (in Spanish). La Jornada. Retrieved January 13, 2021.-

Data.event_text: Attorney General Alejandro Gertz Manero announces that General Salvador Cienfuegos, former Secretary of National Defense (20122018) will not be charged for drug offenses due to a lack of evidence.

links.text: -Linthicum, Kate; McDonnell, Patrick J. (January 15, 2021). "Mexican president accuses U.S. of fabricating drug case against ex-defense chief". news.yahoo.com. Los Angeles Times. Retrieved January 15, 2021.-

Data.event_text: COVID-19 pandemic For the second day in a row, record-breaking 20,000 new cases are reported. A near-record 1,219 more deaths were also reported.

links.text: -"Mexico sees 2nd straight day of 20,000 coronavirus cases". AP NEWS. January 17, 2021. Retrieved January 17, 2021.-

Data.event_text: Twelve bodies whose hands were tied are found along a road in Las Choapas, Veracruz.

links.text: -"Violencia en Veracruz: abandonaron 12 cuerpos en un camino de terracería en Las Choapas". infobae (in European Spanish). January 18, 2021. Retrieved January 18, 2021.-

Data.event_text: The Mexican National Guard stops a truck with 130 Central American migrants in Veracruz.

links.text: -"Mexico stops truck carrying migrants from Central America". news.yahoo.com. Yahoo News. Reuters. January 21, 2021. Retrieved January 21, 2021.-

Data.event_text: AMLO announces that private companies and the states will be allowed to purchase vaccines against COVID-19.

links.text: -"Mexico may delay second doses of COVID-19 vaccine, allows private orders". news.yahoo.com. Reuters. January 22, 2021. Retrieved January 23, 2021.-

Data.event_text: Bank accounts of Juan Ramón Collado, former lawyer for ex-president Enrique Peña Nieto, and 22 other Mexican investors, with a value of €2 billion (MXN $48 billion), are seized in Andorra for financial fraud.

links.text: -"Andorra confisca 48 mil millones de pesos a 23 mexicanos". Aristegui Noticias (in Spanish). January 30, 2021. Retrieved February 1, 2021.-

Data.event_text: Nineteen burned bodies are found in Camargo Municipality, Tamaulipas, likely victims of drug violence.

links.text: -"19 burned bodies found near Mexico-US border town". AP NEWS. January 24, 2021. Retrieved January 24, 2021.-

Data.event_text: President López Obrador announces he has COVID-19. Interior Secretary Olga Sánchez Cordero will be taking over for him in his daily news conferences.

links.text: -"Mexico's president says he's tested positive for COVID-19". AP NEWS. January 25, 2021. Retrieved January 24, 2021.-

Data.event_text: The 2020 Mexican census reveals there are 120 million people in the country with a median age of 29. 1.2 million are foreign born (800,000 in the United States), and 7.4 million people speak an indigenous language. The State of Mexico, with 17 million people, is the most populous; Colima, with 732,000, is the least.

links.text: -"Mexico population rises to 126M; now older, better educated". news.yahoo.com. AP. January 25, 2021. Retrieved January 25, 2021.-

Data.event_text: COVID-19 pandemic The death toll passes 150,000.

links.text: -"México supera las 150,000 muertes por COVID-19". infobae (in European Spanish). January 25, 2021. Retrieved January 25, 2021.-

Data.event_text: A pack of dogs attacks and kills two adult kangaroos and a joey in La Pastora Zoo in Monterrey.

links.text: -"Perros hambrientos ingresan a zoológico del parque La Pastora y mata a dos canguros y su cría". El Universal (in Spanish). January 26, 2021. Retrieved January 26, 2021.-

Data.event_text: Four homes collapse and 35 are near collapse, displacing 50 families in colonia 3 de Octubre, delegación Sánchez Taboada, Tijuana because of heavy rains and flooding. The area was declared high risk in 2019.

links.text: -Cuéllar, Mireya (January 30, 2021). "La Jornada - Desalojan a 50 familias por hundimiento en colonia de Tijuana". jornada.com.mx (in Spanish). 'La Jornada' Baja California. Retrieved January 30, 2021.-

Data.event_text: Twelve police officers are arrested in the relation to the  massacre of migrants in Camargo Municipality, Tamaulipas.

links.text: -"Arrestaron a 12 policías implicados en la masacre de Tamaulipas que dejó 19 cadáveres calcinados". infobae (in European Spanish). February 3, 2021. Retrieved February 3, 2021.-

Data.event_text: CFE pardons thousands of debts going back 26 years worth MXN $11 billion in Tabasco.

links.text: -Guzman, Armando (February 2, 2021). "La CFE cancela a tabasqueños su millonaria e histórica deuda por más de 11 mil mdp". proceso.com.mx (in Spanish). Proceso. Retrieved February 2, 2021.-

Data.event_text: Twelve police officers are arrested in the relation to the January 24 massacre of migrants in Camargo Municipality, Tamaulipas.

links.text: -"Arrestaron a 12 policías implicados en la masacre de Tamaulipas que dejó 19 cadáveres calcinados". infobae (in European Spanish). February 3, 2021. Retrieved February 3, 2021.-

Data.event_text: A riot breaks out at Distribuidor Vial San Antonio in CDMX after police try to break up a demonstration by cyclists who were protesting after a Metrobús ran over a bicyclist. Eleven police officers are arrested.

links.text: -Pantoja, Sara (February 6, 2021). "Policías de Tránsito golpean a ciclistas que protestaban por la muerte de un compañero en CDMX". proceso.com.mx (in Spanish). Proceso. Retrieved February 6, 2021.-
-"Policías causan riña en manifestación de ciclistas en CDMX". POSTA (in Mexican Spanish). February 6, 2021. Retrieved February 6, 2021.[permanent dead link]-
-Bravo, Elba Mónica (February 6, 2021). "La Jornada - Separan de su cargo a once elementos de la SSC tras riña con ciclistas". jornada.com.mx (in Spanish). La Jornada. Retrieved February 6, 2021.-

Data.event_text: AMLO and other officials take a fifteen-minute Air Force inaugural flight from the Benito Juárez International Airport to the Santa Lucía Airport.

links.text: -"El aeropuerto de Santa Lucía es "una hazaña": AMLO aterrizó por primera vez en su obra insignia". infobae (in European Spanish). February 10, 2021. Retrieved February 10, 2021.-

Data.event_text: AMLO pays homage to Vicente Guerrero in Cuilapan de Guerrero, Oaxaca, but he confuses Guerrero and José María Morelos. American civil rights leader Martin Luther King III addresses the need for Mexico to reconcile itself with its past of slavery.

links.text: -"AMLO comete pifia histórica al afirmar que Vicente Guerrero escribió los Sentimientos de la Nación". infobae (in European Spanish). February 14, 2021. Retrieved February 14, 2021.-
-Daniel, Frank Jack (February 14, 2021). "Truth panel could help Mexico with slavery legacy, says Martin Luther King III". news.yahoo.com. Reuters. Retrieved February 14, 2021.-

Data.event_text: Temperatures as low as −18 °C (0 °F) are recorded as shortages of natural gas lead to blackouts in Nuevo León, Coahuila, Tamaulipas, and Chihuahua along the Texas border. Five million are left in the dark.

links.text: -"¿Por qué hace tanto frío en Texas? La histórica tormenta invernal que dejó sin electricidad al norte de México". BBC News Mundo (in Spanish). February 15, 2021. Retrieved February 16, 2021.-

Data.event_text: Over a dozen people have died in Ciudad Juárez, Chihuahua; Río Bravo and Matamoros, Tamaulipas; and Monterrey, Nuevo León; because of winter storms.

links.text: -Estrada, Jesús (February 16, 2021). "Tormenta invernal deja 12 muertos en estados del norte". jornada.com.mx (in Spanish). La Jornada. Retrieved February 16, 2021.-

Data.event_text: COVID-19 Mexico passes two million confirmed coronavirus cases and 175,000 deaths, third highest in the world.

links.text: -"Mexico rises above 2 million confirmed coronavirus cases". AP NEWS. February 17, 2021. Retrieved February 19, 2021.-

Data.event_text: Sixteen people are arrested for kidnapping in Veracruz, including former beauty queen Laura Mojica Romero, 25.

links.text: -"Mexico beauty queen among those arrested in kidnap gang". news.yahoo.com. The Independent. February 16, 2021. Retrieved February 18, 2021.-

Data.event_text: AMLO says Mexico will increase the use of oil and coal as well as purchasing three shiploads of natural gas to deal with power shortages. Periodic local outages will continue through .

links.text: -"Se importará gas en buque y se reactivarán plantas de combustóleo y carbón ante crisis eléctrica: AMLO". proceso.com.mx (in Spanish). Proceso. February 17, 2021. Retrieved February 17, 2021.-

Data.event_text: AMLO asks people to save energy.

links.text: -Martínez, Fabiola. "La Jornada - Pide AMLO a la población ahorrar energía por la noche". jornada.com.mx (in Spanish). La Jornada. Retrieved February 18, 2021.-

Data.event_text: Ford Motor Company, Volkswagen, and Audi reduce production or close plants due to gas shortages. 120,000 employees of 30 companies in Ciudad Juárez lose their jobs in restaurants and factories due to gas shortages.

links.text: -"Paran automotrices en EU y México por temporal y apagones". jornada.com.mx (in Spanish). La Jornada. AFP and Reuters. February 18, 2021. Retrieved February 18, 2021.-
-Villalpando, Rubén; Sánchez, Martín; Salinas, Javier. "Cierran 30 empresas en Chihuahua por falta de gas". jornada.com.mx (in Spanish). La Jornada. Retrieved February 18, 2021.-

Data.event_text: President AMLO announces that rescue of the 65 missing bodies from the 2006 Pasta de Conchos mine disaster has begun.

links.text: -Martínez, Fabiola (February 19, 2021). "Se iniciaron labores de rescate en Pasta de Conchos: AMLO". jornada.com.mx (in Spanish). Infobae. Retrieved February 19, 2021.-

Data.event_text: Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro offers to sell natural gas to Mexico despite the blockade.

links.text: -"Venezuela ofrece a México proveerlo de gas "de forma segura"". El Universal (in Spanish). February 19, 2021. Retrieved February 19, 2021.-

Data.event_text: A Learjet 45 belonging to the Air Force crashes before landing at El Lencero Airport in Xalapa. 102 aircraft belonging to SEDENA have crashed in since 2006, 48% in the drug war.

links.text: -"Atentados del narco y fallas mecánicas: los peores "avionazos" en México y sus fatales consecuencias". infobae (in European Spanish). February 21, 2021. Retrieved February 21, 2021.-

Data.event_text: Ceremony honoring 200 years of the Plan de Iguala The plaza of Iguala is plastered with narcomantas (messages from drug cartels) in anticipation of a visit by Presidents López Obrador and Alberto Fernández of Argentina.

links.text: -Flores Conteras, Ezequiel (February 23, 2021). "Iguala amanece tapizada de narcomantas previo al arribo de los presidentes de México y Argentina". proceso.com.mx (in Spanish). Proceso. Retrieved February 24, 2021.-

Data.event_text: The FGR issues a warrant to arrest Raúl Beyruti, president of GINgroup, for activities related to organized crime. Beyruti is accused of hiding MXN $34 billion from 92 outsourcing companies.

links.text: -"Ordenan arrestar a Raúl Beyruti, el "rey del outsourcing"". proceso.com.mx (in Spanish). Proceso. February 24, 2021. Retrieved February 24, 2021.-

Data.event_text: Twenty-seven migrants seeking asylum in the United States are allowed to leave their makeshift camp in Matamoros, Tamaulipas and cross the border to make their cases. Some people were allowed to cross from Tijuana to San Ysidro, California last week.

links.text: -"First asylum seekers from Mexico's Matamoros border camp enter US". aljazeera.com. Al Jazeera English. February 25, 2021. Retrieved February 28, 2021.-

Data.event_text: A court rules that Rosario Robles′ offer to reveal everything she knows about the Estafa Maestra (″Master Scam″) in return for a reduced sentence is invalid because she refused to repay the MXN $5 billion she is accused of stealing.

links.text: -Castillo García, Gustavo (February 13, 2021). "Formaliza Robles decisión de 'revelar' la 'estafa maestra'". jornada.com.mx (in Spanish). La Jornada. Retrieved February 13, 2021.-

-"Rosario Robles no logró acuerdo con FGR: se negó a reponer el boquete de 5,500 millones de pesos por la Estafa Maestra". infobae (in European Spanish). February 26, 2021. Retrieved February 26, 2021.-

Data.event_text: The Secretariat of Environment and Natural Resources (SEMARNAT) announced that it may reduce the protected area for the vaquita in the Sea of Cortés as there are only ten of the tiny porpoises left and it may never recuperate its historical range. The announcement comes two months after a fishing boat was deliberately sunk, killing a Mexican fisherman, during Sea Shepherd Conservation Society operations.

links.text: -"Mexico may reduce protection area for endangered porpoise". news.yahoo.com. AP. February 27, 2021. Retrieved February 28, 2021.-

Data.event_text: Mexico and the European Union (EU) sign an agreement, part of the Arms Trade Treaty (ATT), to control the illicit entry of guns into Mexico. It is estimated that between 250,000 and 280,000 firearms are imported by organized crime every year.

links.text: -"México y la Unión Europea lanzaron un programa en contra del tráfico de armas". infobae (in European Spanish). February 28, 2021. Retrieved February 28, 2021.-

Data.event_text: Mexico and the United States agree to continue border restrictions until .

links.text: -"La Jornada - Extienden México y EU restricciones al tránsito fronterizo". jornada.com.mx (in Spanish). La Jornada. Retrieved January 12, 2021.-

Data.event_text: Pemex and Braskem Idesa renegotiate their contract for natural gas, saving Pemex MXN $13.749 billion.

links.text: -"El acuerdo entre el gobierno y Braskem ahorrará 13,749 mdp a Pemex". msn.com. Expansion. March 3, 2021. Retrieved March 3, 2021.-

Data.event_text: Metal walls measuring 3 m (9.8 ft) installed in Mexico City's Zócalo to protect historic buildings are turned into a shrine on International Women's Day. Demonstrators also express their rejection of Felix Salgado as a candidate for governor of Guerrero.

links.text: -Solomon, Daina Beth (March 8, 2021). "Women's Day marches in Mexico bring anger to the streets". news.yahoo.com. Reuters. Retrieved March 8, 2021.-

Data.event_text: Sixty-two police officers and 19 civilians are injured (ten seriously) as 20,000 demonstrate in Mexico City. There were demonstrations in every state.

links.text: -Pantoja, sara (March 8, 2021). "SSC dice que hubo hombres infiltrados y 81 heridos en la marcha 8M". proceso.com.mx (in Spanish). Proceso. Retrieved March 9, 2021.-
-"Hubo protestas en los 31 estados; en algunos se reportan desmanes". jornada.com.mx (in Spanish). La Jornada. March 8, 2021. Retrieved March 9, 2021.-

Data.event_text: Writer and diplomat Andrés Roemer, who has been accused of sexual harassment and rape, seals his mansion in Colonia Roma off from the street with large wooden plates.

links.text: -"Diplomático mexicano acusado de abuso blinda su casa en el Día de la Mujer". es-us.finanzas.yahoo.com (in Spanish). EFE. March 8, 2021. Retrieved March 9, 2021.-

Data.event_text: Cuauhtémoc Gutiérrez de la Torre (PRI), 52, is arrested and charged with attempted sexual exploitation, false advertising, and criminal conspiracy.

links.text: -"Mexico charges ex-political boss in sex recruiting scandal". news.yahoo.com. AP. March 9, 2021. Retrieved March 9, 2021.-

Data.event_text: Traffic is backed up at ten strategic points of the CDMX as members of the Fuerza Amplia de Transportistas (Broad Transportation Force) demand a MXN $2 increase in fares for concessioned minibuses, vans, and buses.

links.text: -"Así las afectaciones por bloqueos de transportistas en vialidades de CDMX". El Universal (in Spanish). March 10, 2021. Retrieved March 10, 2021.-
-"Coronavirus 25 de marzo. México acumula 200 mil 211 muertes por Covid-19". El Universal (in Spanish). March 25, 2021. Retrieved March 25, 2021.-

Data.event_text: Socorro Flores Liera takes the oath as the first Mexican woman to become a Judge of the International Criminal Court (ICC).

links.text: -"Socorro Flores Liera, primera jueza mexicana en la Corte Penal Internacional". Aristegui Noticias (in Spanish). March 10, 2021. Retrieved March 10, 2021.-

Data.event_text: Non-essential travel restrictions are beefed up along both the Mexico-Guautemala and Mexico-U.S. borders until . The United States offers to lend 2.5 doses of AstraZeneca COVID-19 vaccine.

links.text: -"Mexico to tighten borders against COVID-19 as U.S. plans vaccine help". news.yahoo.com. Reuters. March 18, 2021. Retrieved March 18, 2021.-

Data.event_text: At least thirteen police officers are ambushed and killed by a criminal gang in Coatepec Harinas, State of Mexico.

links.text: -"Asesinan a 13 policías del Edomex en emboscada". Aristegui Noticias (in Spanish). March 18, 2021. Retrieved March 18, 2021.-

Data.event_text: An unidentified Mexican girl, 9, drowns on the Mexican side of the Rio Grande (Soanish Rio Bravo) near Eagle Pass, Texas.

links.text: -"9-year-old drowns trying to cross Rio Grande from Mexico into U.S." NBC News. March 26, 2021. Retrieved March 26, 2021.-

Data.event_text: Three leaders of La Familia Michoacana are identified and 25 others are detained in the  killing of 13 policie officers in the State of Mexico.

links.text: -"Mexico charges 3, detains 25 in ambush killing of 13 police". news.yahoo.com. AP. March 23, 2021. Retrieved March 24, 2021.-

Data.event_text: The official number of COVID-19-related deaths is more than 200,000.
Day of Indigenous Peoples' Resistance in Champotón, Campeche. AMLO and Bolivian President Luis Arce pay homage to the people of Chakán Putum.

links.text: -Garduño, Roberto (March 26, 2021). "Homenaje a los héroes anónimos de Chakán Putum". jornada.com.mx (in Spanish). La Jornada. Retrieved March 26, 2021.-

Data.event_text: Twenty homes are damaged and 1,100 people are evacuated as a forest fire ravages the ″Sierra de Santiago″, Nuevo León. Seventy-five forest fires rage in 20 states.

links.text: -Robledo, Raúl (March 26, 2021). "Desalojan a mil 100 personas por incendio en Sierra de Santiago, NL". jornada.com.mx (in Spanish). La Jornada. Retrieved March 26, 2021.-
-"Hay 75 incendios forestales en 20 estados; desalojan a mil 100 personas". jornada.com.mx (in Spanish). La Jornada. March 26, 2021. Retrieved March 26, 2021.-

Data.event_text: Reforma reports that drug kingpin Rafael Caro Quintero has lost his appeal to avoid extradition to the United States for the alleged murder in 1985 of DEA agent Kiki Camarena.

links.text: -"Mexican trafficker wanted by U.S. loses court appeal over extradition". news.yahoo.com. Reuters. March 27, 2021. Retrieved March 28, 2021.-

Data.event_text: COVID-19 Data show 294,287-related virus deaths by , 61.4% higher than previously reported. Excess deaths are said to be 417,002.

links.text: -"Mexico's COVID death toll much higher than previously reported". aljazeera.com. Al Jazeera English. March 28, 2021. Retrieved March 28, 2021.-

Data.event_text: The Valley of Mexico reaches record-high levels of air pollution, especially coarse particulate matter, PM10.

links.text: -"La región menos transparente: así fue la tolvanera en CDMX". El Universal (in Spanish). March 29, 2021. Retrieved March 29, 2021.-

Data.event_text: Authorities in Quintana Roo open an investigation into the death of a 12-year-old boy at Xcaret Park.

links.text: -"Equipment error kills 13-year-old at Mexico's XCaret park". news.yahoo.com. AP. April 1, 2021. Retrieved April 2, 2021.-

Data.event_text: The Secretary of Security and Citizen Protection in Ecatepec de Morelos dismantles a huachicolero center on more than 7,000 m2 (75,000 sq ft) containing more than 250 containers of 250,000 L (66,000 US gal).

links.text: -"Aristegui Noticias" (in Spanish). April 2, 2021. Retrieved April 2, 2021.-

Data.event_text: Daylight saving time in Mexico begins.

links.text: -"Horario de verano 2021 en México: qué día y a qué hora inicia". infobae (in European Spanish). March 1, 2021. Retrieved March 1, 2021.-

Data.event_text: Non-essential travel restrictions are beefed up along both the Mexico-Guautemala and Mexico-U.S. borders until . The United States offers to lend 2.5 doses of AstraZeneca COVID-19 vaccine.

links.text: -"Mexico to tighten borders against COVID-19 as U.S. plans vaccine help". news.yahoo.com. Reuters. March 18, 2021. Retrieved March 18, 2021.-

Data.event_text: At least 23 people are killed when a Mexico City Metro train collapses in the TezoncoOlivos elevated interstation.

links.text: -Andrew Herrera, Karina (May 3, 2021). "Se desploma 'ballena' con trenes del Metro CDMX en la estación Olivos de la Línea 12". Noticieros Televisa (in Spanish). Retrieved May 3, 2021.-

Data.event_text: Hundreds rally at the site of a deadly Metro collapse to demand justice after revelations of ignored safety warnings, design problems and allegations of corruption by local officials.

links.text: -"Mexico City metro: Hundreds protest at scene of deadly rail collapse". BBC News. May 8, 2021. Retrieved May 9, 2021.6-

Data.event_text: '′Ceremonia de la Cruz Parlante′′ (Ceremony of the End of the Caste War of Yucatán) in Felipe Carrillo Puerto, Quintana Roo.
Seven hundred years since the founding of Tenochtitlan.
The Puebla sinkhole in Zacatapec, Puebla, grows to 400 feet (120 meters) across and 50 feet (15 meters) deep, swallowing a nearby house. The sinkhole first appeared on .

links.text: -"Sinkhole at Mexico farm swallows more land, eats at house". news.yahoo.com. AP. June 10, 2021. Retrieved June 10, 2021.-

Data.event_text: 2021 Mexican legislative election
2021 Mexican local elections
2021 Mexican gubernatorial elections
The Puebla sinkhole in Zacatapec, Puebla, grows to 400 feet (120 meters) across and 50 feet (15 meters) deep, swallowing a nearby house. The sinkhole first appeared on May 29.

links.text: -"Sinkhole at Mexico farm swallows more land, eats at house". news.yahoo.com. AP. June 10, 2021. Retrieved June 10, 2021.-

Data.event_text: Residents of Los Guajes de Ayala, Coyuca de Catalán, Guerrero, use social media to ask for federal help after three days of being held hostage by La Familia Michoacana.

links.text: -"Sitiados por el crimen organizado, piden auxilio pobladores de Coyuca de Catalán". www.proceso.com.mx (in Spanish). Proceso. Retrieved June 10, 2021.-

Data.event_text: After 150 hours of work, the last of seven bodies of coal miners trapped for a week in Múzquiz Municipality, Coahuila, is found.

links.text: -"Rescataron el séptimo cuerpo del séptimo minero en Múzquiz, Coahuila". infobae (in European Spanish). Infoabae. June 11, 2021. Retrieved June 11, 2021.-

Data.event_text: Texas governor Greg Abbott says he will build a wall along the Texas-Mexico border, including the states of Chihuauhua, Coahuila, Nuevo León, and Tamaulipas. Undocumented immigrants will be arrested for trespassing.

links.text: -"Texas Gov. Abbott vows to build a border wall with Mexico". NBC News. June 11, 2021. Retrieved June 11, 2021.-

Data.event_text: Five hundred years of the history of Mexico City.
Two hundred years since the signing of the Treaty of Córdoba.
The Mexican Supreme Court unanimously rules that penalties for abortion are unconstitutional, thereby decriminalising it across the whole country.

links.text: -"Mexico decriminalises abortion in landmark ruling". BBC. September 7, 2021. Retrieved September 8, 2021.-

Data.event_text: The 2021 Guerrero earthquake, measuring a magnitude 7.0, strikes near Acapulco, killing at least nine.

links.text: -"M 7.0 - Acapulco, Mexico". earthquake.usgs.gov. U.S. Geological Survey. Retrieved September 11, 2021.-

Chiapas truck crash

A fisherman dies after his boat collided on , 2020, with the Farley Mowat operated by U.S.-based Sea Shepherd Conservation Society in the Gulf of California. The family says the man's boat was rammed by the Farley Mowat, and the conservationists claim their boat was attacked while removing illegal fishing nets.

links.text: -"Mexican fisherman 'dies after attack on Sea Shepherd conservationists'". news.yahoo.com. BBC World News. January 4, 2021. Retrieved January 5, 2021.-
